computation_calculations:
Gasto per cápita de las administraciones públicas autonómicas y locales en la preservación, protección y conservación del patrimonio cultural
Gasto per cápita de las administraciones públicas autonómicas en la preservación, protección y conservación del patrimonio cultural
Gasto per cápita de las administraciones públicas locales en la preservación, protección y conservación del patrimonio cultural
indicator_name: Total expenditure (public and private) per capita spent on the preservation, protection and conservation of all cultural and natural heritage, by type of heritage (cultural, natural, mixed and World Heritage Centre designation), level of government (national, regional and local/municipal), type of expenditure (operating expenditure/investment) and type of private funding (donations in kind, private non-profit sector and sponsorship)
graph_title: Total expenditure (public and private) per capita spent on the preservation, protection and conservation of all cultural and natural heritage, by type of heritage (cultural, natural, mixed and World Heritage Centre designation), level of government (national, regional and local/municipal), type of expenditure (operating expenditure/investment) and type of private funding (donations in kind, private non-profit sector and sponsorship)
target_name: Strengthen efforts to protect and safeguard the world’s cultural and natural heritage
